name: react-native-shiki-engine-monorepo
description: Shiki syntax highlighting for React Native - Monorepo
author: Ryan Skinner <hello@ryanskinner.com> (https://github.com/skiniks)

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules .idea .pnpm-store .turbo && find packages examples -type d \( -name node_modules -o -name lib -o -name build -o -name Pods -o -name .gradle -o -name vendor -o -name .cxx -o -name .turbo -o -name .expo \) -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -rf examples/expo-app/android examples/expo-app/ios
